warscrolls.name: Avatar of Khaine
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine

abilities.name: Wrath of Khaine
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If the target is a **MONSTER**, double the amount of mortal damage inflicted.

warscrolls.name: Bladewind
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine

abilities.name: Unnatural Edge
abilities.declare: If this **MANIFESTATION** charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore positive modifiers to save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Blood Sisters
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Melusai

abilities.name: Crystal Touch
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Blood Stalkers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Melusai

abilities.name: Heartseekers
abilities.effect: If this unit has not used a **MOVE** ability this turn and was not set up this turn, this unit’s shooting attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Bloodwrack Medusa
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Melusai

abilities.name: Melusai Kin
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO MELUSAI** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

abilities.name: Bloodwrack Stare
abilities.effect: Each time this unit attacks with its **Bloodwrack Stare**, if the attack scores a hit, roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that unit. You cannot pick the same enemy unit to be targeted by attacks made with a **Bloodwrack** **Stare** more than once per phase.

warscrolls.name: Bloodwrack Shrine
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Melusai

abilities.name: Bladed Impact
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Aura of Agony
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 different enemy units within 9" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Bloodwrack Stare
abilities.effect: Each time this unit attacks with its **Bloodwrack Stare**, if the attack scores a hit, roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that unit. You cannot pick the same enemy unit to be targeted by attacks made with a **Bloodwrack** **Stare** more than once per phase.

warscrolls.name: Bloodwrack Viper
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine

abilities.name: Crushing Coils
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **INFANTRY HERO** in combat with this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Doomfire Warlocks
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Wizard (1), Cavalry, Champion, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Outmanoeuvre
abilities.effect: When this unit uses the ‘Redeploy’ command, if you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance this unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.

warscrolls.name: Gryselle’s Arenai
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Acrobatic Bloodshed
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, while this unit is in combat with the target, its combat attacks must target that enemy unit. In addition, if any of this unit’s attacks score a critical hit on the target this phase, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Hag Queen
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Witchbrew
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Hag Queen on Cauldron of Blood
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), War Machine, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf, Cauldron of Blood

abilities.name: Witchbrew
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Bladed Impact
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Altar of Khaine
abilities.effect:
Add 1 to save rolls for friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE INFANTRY** units while they are wholly within 9" of this unit.
In addition, add 1 to chanting rolls for friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIESTS** while they are wholly within 9" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Heart of Fury
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Invocation, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine

abilities.name: Locus of the Murder God
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for combat attacks that target friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE INFANTRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

warscrolls.name: High Gladiatrix
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Paragon of Slaughter
abilities.declare: If this unit is in combat, pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF** non-**HERO INFANTRY** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Killing Stroke
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, it is automatically destroyed.

warscrolls.name: Khainite Shadowstalkers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/9), Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Shadow Leap
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Khinerai Heartrenders
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Khinerai

abilities.name: Death From Above
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **in the skies**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Fire and Flight
abilities.effect: If this unit used a **SHOOT** ability this phase, this unit can move D6". It cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

abilities.name: Circling in the Skies Above
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **in the skies**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Khinerai Lifetakers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Khinerai

abilities.name: Death From Above
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **in the skies**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Fight and Flight
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: After resolving the effect of that **FIGHT** ability, this unit can immediately move D6". It cannot end that move in combat with any units that it was not already in combat with at the start of the move.

abilities.name: Circling in the Skies Above
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **in the skies**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Knives of the Crone
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Rituals of Prophecy
abilities.effect:
Roll 6 dice:

• For each 1, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.
• For each 3, add 1" to this unit’s Move characteristic until the start of your next turn.
• If any of the rolls are a 6, add 1 to save rolls for this unit until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Krethusa the Croneseer
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Murder of Crows
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. If the chanting roll was 8+, roll a D6 instead. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. In addition, if the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Burnt Offerings
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Any Hero Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit is within the combat range of a friendly **CAULDRON OF BLOOD,** pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF** non‑**HERO INFANTRY** unit wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply to the target.

***Prophecy of Silence:*** Until the start of your next turn, enemy units cannot use commands while they are in combat with the target.

***Prophecy of Dark Wings:*** The target can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase. That unit counts as having used a **RUN** ability this turn.

***Prophecy of Reclamation:*** For the rest of the turn, while the target is contesting an objective, subtract 10 from the control scores of enemy units contesting that objective that do not have the **HERO** or **MONSTER** keyword.

warscrolls.name: Maleneth Witchblade
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Vial of Secrets
abilities.effect: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack that targets this unit is 1-4, the attack fails and the attack sequence ends.

abilities.name: Strike From the Shadows
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **in hiding**. Then, pick a friendly **INFANTRY** unit that has 5 or more models to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 6" of the target. If you do so, this unit must be set up in combat and has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn. On a failed roll, this unit remains **in hiding** but you automatically pass the roll the next time you use this ability.

abilities.name: Hidden Agent
abilities.effect: If this unit has not been deployed, set up this unit in reserve **in hiding**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Melusai Ironscale
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Melusai

abilities.name: Wrath of the Scáthborn
abilities.effect: You can re-roll charge rolls for friendly **MELUSAI** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Gory Offering
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO MELUSAI** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Morathi-Khaine
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Wizard (3), Infantry, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: One Soul, Two Bodies
abilities.effect:
Each time a damage point would be allocated to this unit, it is instead allocated to a friendly **The Shadow Queen** (you cannot make any further ward rolls for that damage point).

If this unit would be automatically destroyed by another ability, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 3 damage points to a friendly **The** **Shadow Queen** (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

If a friendly **The Shadow Queen** is destroyed, this unit is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Mirror Dance
abilities.declare: If a friendly **Shadow Queen** is on the battlefield, make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Place 2 tokens on the battlefield, one directly underneath the centre of this unit’s base and one directly underneath the centre of a friendly **Shadow** **Queen’s** base. Then, remove this unit and that **Shadow Queen** from the battlefield. Set up each unit again with its base overlapping the centre of the other token, then remove the tokens. If it is not possible to set up either of the units on the battlefield, return both units to their original positions. Each unit can only be set up in combat with units that the other unit was already in combat with.

abilities.name: Sorceress Supreme
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

warscrolls.name: Morgwaeth's Blade-coven
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Witchbrew
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Morgwaeth the Bloodied
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Morgwaeth the Bloodied** is on the battlefield, it has **PRIEST (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Bloodwrack Shrine
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (2), Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Melusai

abilities.name: Wracking Gaze
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 15" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is equal to or less than that enemy unit’s Health characteristic, for the rest of the phase, you can re-roll failed hit rolls for attacks made by this unit that target that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Reflected Agony
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, enemy units and enemy **MANIFESTATIONS** cannot be set up within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Krethusa the Croneseer
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Priest (2), Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Gift of Foresight
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**UNIQUE DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF INFANTRY** or **CAVALRY** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Blood Ritual
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF INFANTRY** or **CAVALRY** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target. Then, make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn:

***Prophecy of Tyranny:*** Enemy units cannot use commands while they are in combat with the target.

***Prophecy of Shelter:*** Other than the **COMPANION** ability, weapon abilities used by enemy units while they are in combat with the target have no effect.

***Prophecy of Retribution:*** Subtract 1 from ward rolls made for damage points inflicted by the target’s combat attacks.

If the chanting roll was 9+, all of the above effects apply.

abilities.name: The Croneseer
abilities.effect: Give this unit D3 ritual points.

warscrolls.name: Sisters of Slaughter with Bladed Bucklers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Dance of Diversion
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Bladed Bucklers
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Sisters of Slaughter with Sacrificial Knives
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Dance of Death
abilities.effect: This unit can move 3". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units and can end that move in combat.

warscrolls.name: Slaughter Queen
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Orgy of Slaughter
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF INFANTRY** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Slaughter Queen on Cauldron of Blood
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), War Machine, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf, Cauldron of Blood

abilities.name: Bladed Impact
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Orgy of Slaughter
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF INFANTRY** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Altar of Khaine
abilities.effect:
Add 1 to save rolls for friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE INFANTRY** units while they are wholly within 9" of this unit.

In addition, add 1 to chanting rolls for friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIESTS** while they are wholly within 9" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: The Shadeborn
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Shadow Leap
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Mask of Shadowed Mirrors
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: The Shadow Queen
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine

abilities.name: Iron Heart of Khaine
abilities.effect:
You cannot allocate more than 3 damage points to this unit each turn. Once 3 points have been allocated to this unit in a turn, any further damage points that would be allocated to it are ignored.

Damage points allocated to this unit cannot be healed.

If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 3 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Fury of the Shadow Queen
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If any models are slain by this ability, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **KHINERAI** and **MELUSAI** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Witch Aelves with Bladed Bucklers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Bladed Bucklers
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Witch Aelves with Paired Sciansá
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Order, Daughters of Khaine, Aelf

abilities.name: Frenzied Fervour
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn if this unit charged in the same turn.

rules.name: Speed of the Scáthborn
rules.effect: If the unmodified charge roll for a friendly **MELUSAI** or **KHINERAI** unit is 8+, that unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

rules.name: Graceful Elusion
rules.effect: For the rest of the phase, friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF INFANTRY** units have **WARD (5+)** until they have used a **FIGHT** ability.

rules.name: Shadowpaths
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE INFANTRY** unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
rules.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

rules.name: Gladiatorial Acrobatics
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a CHARGE ability for a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF unit
rules.effect: Change one of the dice in the charge roll to a 4.

rules.name: Higher Purpose
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
rules.effect: Return D3 slain models to each friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF INFANTRY** unit.

rules.name: Frenzied Devotees
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
rules.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE INFANTRY** or **WAR MACHINE** units that are in combat to be the targets.
rules.effect:
For each target:

• Make a pile-in move.
• Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

spells.name: Covenant of the Iron Heart
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to the target’s control score until the start of your next turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, add 5 to the target’s control score until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Martyr's Sacrifice
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time a model in the target unit is slain by a combat attack, before removing the model from play, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a dice. If the chanting roll was 8+, roll 2 dice instead of 1. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that enemy unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

spells.name: Sacrament of Blood
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the current battle round number when determining which effects of the ‘Blood Rites’ ability apply to the target. If the chanting roll was 10+, until the start of your next turn, treat the current battle round number as 5 when determining which effects of the ‘Blood Rites’ ability apply to the target instead.

spells.name: Steed of Shadows
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: The target can use **CHARGE** abilities this turn even if it used a **RUN** ability in the same turn.

spells.name: Doomfire
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect:
If the target unit has fewer than 10 models, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

If the target unit has 10-19 models, inflict D6 mortal damage on the target.

If the target unit has 20 or more models, inflict 6 mortal damage on the target.

spells.name: Mindrazor
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn. In addition, if the target charged this turn, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of its melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Scáthscale
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF INFANTRY** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from wound rolls for combat attacks that target that friendly unit. If the chanting roll was 8+, until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from wound rolls for combat attacks that target friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF INFANTRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of the target of this ability instead.

spells.name: Shadowstep
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF INFANTRY** unit wholly within 12" of them and that has not been picked to be the target of this prayer this turn to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: The target can move up to 6". It can move through the combat ranges of enemy units but cannot end that move in combat. If the chanting roll was 8+, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target.

spells.name: Exultation of Murder
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE AELF INFANTRY** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks. In addition, if the chanting roll was 9+, until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

spells.name: Summon Heart of Fury
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Heart of Fury** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST** to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Heart of Fury** wholly within 18" of the chanter and visible to them.

spells.name: Summon Bladewind
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Bladewind** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Bladewind** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Bloodwrack Viper
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Bloodwrack Viper** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Bloodwrack Viper** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts.name: Crown of Woe
artefacts.effect: Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 9" of this unit.

artefacts.name: Sevenfold Shadow
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
artefacts.effect: If this unit is not in combat, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts.name: Khainite Pendant
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST** wholly within 12" of this unit.
artefacts.effect: Give that unit D6 ritual points.

artefacts.name: Blade of Prophetic Doom
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, End of Any Turn
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+:

• If the target is not damaged, inflict 1 mortal damage on it.
• If the target is damaged, inflict an amount of mortal damage on it equal to the roll.

heroicTraits.name: Bathed in Blood
heroicTraits.effect: **Heal (3)** this unit if it is in combat.

heroicTraits.name: Master of Poisons
heroicTraits.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by this unit’s combat attacks to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect:
For the rest of the battle:

• The target cannot be healed.
• Slain models cannot be returned to the target unit.

heroicTraits.name: Zealous Orator
heroicTraits.effect: If a friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

heroicTraits.name: Proselyte of Morai-Heg
heroicTraits.effect: Enemy units cannot use commands while they are in combat with this unit.

battleTraits.name: All-out Slaughter
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE INFANTRY** unit that is in combat to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: That unit can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this phase. After the first is used, this unit has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Blood Rites
battleTraits.effect:
A different effect applies to friendly **DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE** units each battle round, as shown below. The effects of all previous battle rounds also apply to those units.

**Battle Round 1:**
***Quickening Bloodlust:*** Add 1 to run rolls for this unit.

**Battle Round 2:**
***Headlong Fury:*** Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit.

**Battle Round 3:**
***Zealot’s Rage:*** Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s combat attacks.

**Battle Round 4:**
***Slaughterer’s Wound:*** Add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s combat attacks.

**Battle Round 5:**
***Frenzied Worshippers:*** Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons.

battleTraits.name: Plumes of Auspicious Smoke
battleTraits.effect:
Effect: Friendly **CAULDRON OF BLOOD** units are either **empty** or **full**. They start the battle **empty**. While a friendly **CAULDRON OF BLOOD** unit is **full**:

• That **CAULDRON OF BLOOD** has **WARD (4+)** against damage points inflicted by shooting attacks.
• Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly **CRONESEER’S PARIAHS** units while they are wholly within 9" of that **CAULDRON OF BLOOD**.

battleTraits.name: Skilled Skirmishers
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **CRONESEER’S PARIAHS CAVALRY** unit that has not charged this turn and is in combat with an enemy unit that charged this turn to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On 3+, the target can immediately use a **RETREAT** ability as if it were your movement phase. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on the target by that **RETREAT** ability.

battleTraits.name: Guided by Morai-Heg
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of combat attacks made by friendly non-**HERO INFANTRY** units while they are wholly within 9" of a friendly **Krethusa**.

battleTraits.name: The Blood Reveals All
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **CRONESEER’S PARIAHS HERO** within the combat range of a friendly **empty** **CAULDRON OF BLOOD**. Then, pick another unit within the combat range of that **HERO** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. Allocate a number of damage points to the target equal to the roll (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points). Then, that **CAULDRON OF BLOOD** becomes **full**.

battleTraits.name: Laden with Prophecy
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **empty CAULDRON OF BLOOD**.
battleTraits.effect: If any enemy models were slain this turn by that **CAULDRON OF BLOOD**’s combat attacks, it becomes **full**.
